body:
Day 9 - Manga 87
It fucking hurts, I want to not be able to read shit like this. Fuck.
The art is shitty but better and yet, the dialogue seems like it came from a porno made by two five years old that don't even know the meaning of half of these words.
Fucking kill me.
2/10.
We're in the deep end bois no. 87 whew
They ramped up Ritsuko's bitch meter to like 10000 damn lmao
the story is mediocre, the art as well, not much to really say about it except it was exceptionally middle of the road, 5/10

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me. I Know this may be seem nonsense but not gonna risk , but I don't want to cause too many trouble too so I try select very old manga hope no one read this comment

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't understimate random people curse

One of the most depressing things I've ever read on this site.
And I loved every single page of it.
